General.Name: Xiangyang BOYA Precision Industrial Equipments Co. Ltd
General.Description: Xiangyang BOYA Precision Industrial Equipments Co., Ltd engages in the research and development, production, and sales of precision equipment for sheet and strip forming and processing applications in China and internationally. The company offers precision equipment, such as straightening, shearing, and roller coating equipment for strip forming and processing applications; key components, including roller parts, bearing components, ball cage universal coupling, and special equipment supporting parts; and integration equipment. Xiangyang BOYA Precision Industrial Equipments Co., Ltd was founded in 1999 and is based in Xiangyang, China.
